<< OOC: One thing we can all agree on though, is the fact that JAPAN KICKS 
ASS!!!... >>

(Ummm...I don't think that's true though they've done remarkably considering 
they went from an insignificant place that didn't have steampower until the 
US brought 'em out of isolationism and the overall greatness of their 
economy.  Of course that goes into deeper politics.  And reading Megan's post 
again, I'd like to point out British Columbia may be aiding Californi's power 
crunch, but we are BUYING all our stuff from B.C. I believe and could easily 
replace the timber with our own.

Also, it is Washington State that is MOSTLY aiding California, NOT B.C.  
That's what happens when you privatize power companies though)
